title: Ive Just Been Playing League Of Legends Like Normal But Ive been Leveling Very Quickly
body: Ok so I have been playing League for a while now and I've been leveling very quickly without any leveling boosts. Now whenever I play , I play people above my skill level and people have complained that I am boosting even though I am not. I would create a new account but that would be smurfing and i would lose my stuff. What should i do?

replies.body: We don't take issue with creating another account as long as you are the one who created and solely using it. [ XP was changed ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-65-notes#patch-summoner-level-progression)a few patches ago which nearly cuts the time it takes to reach level 30 by half.  Let me know if that clears things up!
but what if i want to keep the things i bought with rp and ip like {{champion:121}}  with mecha kha zix
All content will stay on the account it is unlocked for. Keep playing on your account as the more games you play the better the system will get at matching you with people around your skill.
